snippet.title: Live from 'The Peyton Hillis game'
snippet.description:
Live from 'The Peyton Hillis game' by David Roth on Oct 22 2013, 3:54p
The Monday Night Football Game between the Giants and Vikings is already being described as an all-time dud. It was a good deal worse if you were there, give or take a member of Anthrax.

snippet.title: Absolut NFL Football Weekend Buffet: The Falcons And Packers Highlight The Best Of The Leftovers
snippet.description:
Absolut NFL Football Weekend Buffet: The Falcons And Packers Highlight The Best Of The Leftovers by Andrew Sharp on Nov 26 2010, 2:36p
Before we get started, I just wanted to remind everyone to check out Saturday Night's announcer-less football game on NFL Network. If enough of us watch, this dream scenario could happen again, and...
